Healthy well prepared options at reasonable cost

Since this is located at a tourist attraction I expect to pay a high price. While the price was not low, I did not feel it was overpriced. It was tasty and healthy. My son got pizza and he liked that too.

We never really expect much from attraction restaurants and this one did not surprise us either. The food was okay. Our party got cheeseburgers, chicken tenders, pizza, and fries. Food was good but very pricey, especially for kids. Would cost a family of 4 close to $100. Drinks are no refill and the cups are not large enough to share. For adults who want quality cafeteria-style food ok but I know it would be a waste of money for picky eater kids.
